content: CFS-BTS Firestop Bottom Track Seal Preformed firestop solution for bottom-of-wall drywall joints – increases productivity at the jobsite and eliminates the need for slow, messy sealants ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Ready to use joints and cavity barriers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Easier to install under real jobsite conditions, compressible firestop joint seal suitable for installation in temperatures as low as 14°F Higher productivity – the preformed firestop replaces 5/8” shims and works with kick-lifts to help save time and improve quality control of drywall install Simpler inspections – may not be subject to destructive testing to prove sealant depth Sound and Leakage-rated joint seal – CFS-BTS firestop can provide STC ratings for fire/sound walls, and has been tested in accordance with L-rating compliance in smoke barrier walls (IBC) Compliance with the most stringent LEED green building regulations – provides industry-leading low VOC, LEED 4.1, and Red List (LBC) compliance Applications Firestop, smoke and sound seal for the bottom-of-the-wall joints between bottom track and drywall on flat concrete slabs Tested and UL listed with standard 1-hour and 2-hour partition walls, resilient channel walls and shaft walls. (5/8” and 1-¼ available) For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: LEED VOC: 1 g/l Approvals: UL 2079 Length: 72 in Technical Data | Approvals | UL 2079 | Length | 72 in | Application | Joints | Movement | No | Storage and transportation temperature range | 14 - 122 °F | Shelf Life | Unlimited | 1 | Product Class | Ultimate | at 77°F/25°C and 50% relative humidity; from date of manufacture ### ITEMS- 2331840 - Bottom track seal CFS-BTS (5/8) - Package Size 70 pc - 2331841 - Bottom track seal CFS-BTS (1-1/4”) - Package Size 70 pc
